First post on the new blog!

Some newfangled technologies for the same posts

So, I've been super excited to develop a new site that will host my blog posts. It's clean, it's easy (after the initial setup, which wasn't too bad), and best of all, it will really speed up the time it takes to write blog posts. I was getting really tired of editing raw HTML so I could get my messages to work out the way I wanted...so now I'll be doing this.

I didn't know it until this morning, but I'm about to head off to a fireside by Elder Christofferson. I've a few pages of scripture to share, but I anticipate more from the fireside, which I'll probably have to save for next week. I hope you enjoy - these are some precious passages that I've found (and rediscovered in some cases):

  • Doctrine and Covenants 65
  • Abraham 2:9-11
Nov 23, 2014
